name: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is:A daily, visibly age-defying eye cream that diminishes the appearance of wrinkles and dark circles..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dark Circles.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Peptides: Support collagen to visibly reduce wrinkles around eyes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of formaldehydes, phthalates, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan..What Else You Need to Know:Smooth and visibly brighten your eye area with this bestselling, visibly age-defying cream. It targets five types of eye-area wrinkles (crow’s feet and frown lines, as well as wrinkles at inner-eye corners, under-eyes, and around eyes) while also prioritizing dark circles and eye-bag puffiness..Clinical Results:In a consumer test with 110 women, after 7 days:
ingredients: -Peptides: Support collagen to visibly reduce wrinkles around eyes..-Squalane: Hydrates and protects skin’s moisture barrier while visibly smoothing fine lines..-Ginseng Extract: Visibly brightens eyes and reduces dark circles...Water (Aqua/Eau), Hydrogenated Polydecene, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum/Huile Minerale), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Paraffin, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline), Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Squalane, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Glutamate, Sodium PCA, Dipropylene Glycol, Carnosine, Beeswax (Cera Alba/Cire D'Abeille), Polyethylene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Caffeine, PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Sapindus Mukorossi Peel Extract, Uncaria Gambir Extract, Angelica Keiskei Leaf/Stem Extract, Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract, Sanguisorba Officinalis Root Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract, Eucheuma Serra/Grateloupia Sparsa/Saccharina Angustata/Ulva Linza/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Sodium Lactate, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Rhizome Extract, Saccharina Angustata/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Alcohol, Trisodium EDTA, Tocopherol, Sodium Metabisulfite, PPG-3 Dipivalate, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, BHT, Alpinia Speciosa Leaf Extract, Carbomer, Polysorbate 20, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Ethylparaben, Methylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine..-Dot a rice grain-size amount around eye area, from orbital bone to brow bone..-Use ring finger to gently massage cream in a circle, starting under eye and around lid/brow bone.

reviews.review_text: This eye cream is extremely emollient. It looks and feels like butter, and a little goes a very long way. It has a classic floral scent that reminds me of something you’d find on your grandmother’s vanity. This might be offensive to some, but I personally don’t mind it. Overall I really enjoy using this and feel like it does help replenish the tired skin under my eyes, while also helping to diminish the appearance of fine lines. However, I don’t think I’d purchase this at the price point because I’ve used less expensive eye products that give me the desired result; that being said, if you love luxurious skincare and want a product that will last you a LONG time, I think you’d enjoy this product. reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This thick and moisturizing eye cream has bold claims and a high pricetag to match- for around $60, Sheiseido boasts that this cream visibly reduces wrinkles and dark undereye circles in a little as a week. While I had my experience using this cream was largely pleasant, I did not notice any significant changes in my eye area during my 4+ weeks of use. Although the cream is very thick, it absorbs well and lays beautifully under concealer with no pilling or smudging of eye makeup layered on top. Any wrinkle reduction was only due to extra hydration that plumped up the skin around my eyes a little.   I do however, want to call attention to the fact that, while being marketed as a luxury product, this eye cream is composed primarily of mineral oil and paraffin along with a host of other potentially harmful chemicals, including parabens. The price tag on this item is certainly not justified given the cheap ingredients used as its chief components.   Although this eye cream performed just fine and felt very rich, I recommend looking for an anti-aging eye cream that uses cleaner ingredients and more advanced technology, rather than relying on a petroleum-based product for your delicate and absorbent eye area.

reviews.review_title: Pretty good, but not ground breaking.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I'm getting older, I'm becoming more aware/careful of what I put on my skin. I used to assume that luxury product companies know what they're doing/lead the way for top tier skin care without including any ingredients that could be harmful, but I'm learning they have plenty of ingredients that can cause issues with my skin. One in particular, Microcrystalline wax, from my understanding is a cause for Milia, which is an issue that I have had to address before with my dermatologist, so I try hard to not purchase items that will cause more so I won't have to be treated for it again. That, for me, is kind of a big knock against it since my skin is prone to Milia. It makes me gun shy to use the product.   Pros: Nice, heavy glass jar that feels like good quality and plastic spatula included for application. Cream was nice and light, didn't feel sticky or heavy/greasy which I appreciate because I don't like how that feels on my hands, let alone my face, especially because my face tends to run oily anyway. I can't speak to under eye/bags puffiness because I don't really have that issue, but I DID notice a subtle difference in terms of fine lines/wrinkles. I'm not sure if it was just filling them in or actually plumping my skin to make it appear more youthful, but I'm happy with the results either way! I will say, though, that I preferred using it out of the shower or on no make-up days, as I didn't like how my makeup applied with it on underneath. Overall, I would say it's a good product, but I wouldn't make it one of my go-to's.

I noticed my eyes has less of a dark circle after the first week. I feel my eye area looks brighter. I look forward to seeing how this does by the time the container is empty.

reviews.review_title: Noticeable difference after a week of use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: received the shiseido eye cream in exchange for my honest review through influenster. I have been using this for well over a month now and I have really been able to see a noticeable difference in fine lines and crows feet. It has minimized those laugh lines in the corner of the eyes when I smile. I do feel like after using this i can observe that the skin under my eyes is not quite as thin, it seems to improve the elasticity of the skin directly underneath the eye. Although I have never had much of a problem with under eye bags or dark skin, it does seem to improve the look of the skin when I put it on in the morning. I notice some definite decrease in puffiness. The product itself comes in an elegant little pot with a gold lid. It is much thicker than a lot of eye creams I have used in the past. It has a lovely, clean smell to it that is not overpowering in the least, nor does it stick around long, which is nice for me because I suffer from migraines, and too much of a perfumey fragrance can really be a trigger. As I mentioned previously, the consistency of this cream is rather thick and creamy and I discovered that it will leave a bit of an oily residue on the skin that lasts for about an hour or so after application. It does not seem to affect the staying power of any makeup you might put on after using the product. The oily residue I noticed also has not caused any problems with acne or skin discomfort of any sort. I have experienced nothing but positive effects from using this product. I would highly rate it as one of the best eye creams I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can honestly say that I have never tried any eye cream as hydrating as the Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream. Since the first day I applied it to my under eyes I noticed the difference in how smooth and hydrating it left my under eyes, lids and whole eye area. It was also a long lasting hydration that wouldn't go away for hours. I also love the way it keeps my under eyes and lids smooth when I apply makeup. I have been using it more at night and have noticed a huge difference in the morning when I am doing my morning routine. It has helped my eye area stay hydrated and that can also help prevent wrinkles. I suffer from extremely dry skin and not much works when it comes to hydrating and moisturizing my skin. So this has been really helpful in my skin care routine and I would love it if they had a moisturizer for face and body with this same hydrating technique I would definitely buy it. I would 100 percent recommend this eye cream to anyone who has extremely dry skin and under eyes like me I think they would love it as much as I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my mid-40s, and my concerns around my eyes are hydration, lightening, and smoothing. I don't have noticeable wrinkles under my eyes, but I am starting to see some crow's feet when I smile. I have a small dark spot under my right eye that usually responds well to vitamin C.   I've used this during my a.m. and p.m. skincare routine as my last step. I dab a tiny amount with my ring finger and gently pat under my undereye and around the eyebone. It left my undereye skin feeling hydrated and soft from the first use. After using it regularly for several weeks, I see that my skin looks smoother and more supple overall. I haven't seen any lightening of the dark spot, but I understand this product isn't targeting that issue.   The eye cream comes in a heavy, round glass container with a twist-off lid that gives a sense of luxury to it. It's a beige-colored cream with a medium lotion consistency that absorbs quickly in the skin without any greasy residue.   It initially has a strong perfume scent but becomes less noticeable over time. However, my preference would be unscented. The scent makes me think of a body lotion; there's no reason to have it in a cream so close to the eye. Overall, the cream is effective, and I recommend it to others looking for these features. However, I would need something with lightening ingredients for my particular needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster free of charge in exchange for testing and providing a review based on my own experiences and opinions. The formula of this product is luxurious, lightweight, and creamy, and only a small amount is needed for effective results. After using this product for several weeks, I can confidently say that it is exceptional. It effectively hydrates and provides anti-aging benefits. I noticed a reduction in wrinkles and a decrease in the visibility of my dark circles. The formula contains Peptides, Ginseng Extract, Caffeine, and Japanese botanicals, which professionally address various concerns in the eye area. Based on my positive experience, I would strongly consider purchasing this product in the future.

The scent is a pleasant one; however, it’s very fragranced which is something I’d prefer to avoid in skincare especially in the delicate eye area.  Overall, I’m still enjoying using this and looking forward to keep using this jar for now. NOTE: I probably wouldn’t recommend if you’re looking for something truly lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shiseido Benefiance Winkle Smoothing Eye Cream is a rich, soothing, moisturizing creme. It has a creamy consistency and absorbs without any greasiness. It has a beautiful scent and is non-irritating to my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the thickness of this product. It feels great going on but does dry well and doesn’t feel crazy thick after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Noticed that the product instructions call for using this product as the last step of your skincare routine.  I chose to use this product in my daytime routine only. I liked that a little went a long way, I experimented with different amounts to find what worked for me. After using it for only one week I started noticing results - my dark circles weren't as pronounced and the skin under my eyes appeared more supple and wasn't as crepey. I've always had dark circles and have tried other products that haven't worked as well or as quick. Although this product left a slick feel and took about a minute to really soak in, it worked well under my concealer and didn't crease or melt away. I'm looking forward to the result after I finish the jar! I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really have enjoyed this eye cream. Many creams I’ve used in the past leave my skin around my eyes feeling greasy and gross. This has be a game changer. I have subtle wrinkles under my eyes and this cream has helped a lot with the appearance of those wrinkles. And the scent is very nice too. I’m sold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Influenster sent me this in exchange for my honest review. I have used it religiously for 3 weeks as my night eye cream. It has a very slight scent. It is not strong or over powering like some other luxury brands. It is so slight that It doesn’t bother my skin or my nose. I hate feeling like my skin care has perfume in and this doesn’t feel like heavy perfume. It has kept my eyes moisturized and plump. I like that it comes with a small scoop so that you don’t have to dip your finger in the jar. I will continue to use and purchase this in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shiseido eye cream comes in a beautiful, heavy duty jar that has a beautiful iridescent sheen . It has a very light, present scent so people whom are sensitive to smells should be able to use it. It is highly moisturizing and makes your under eyes look amazing! I have been using it a couple of weeks and have seen a  slight improvement to the little lines under my eyes. Generally like using a product for a full month before expecting the full result. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a good eye cream!   *Influenster sent me this complimentary in exchange for my honest review. All opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great heavyweight eye cream for night time use. It has a pleasant scent and offers a soothing effect that is appealing as part of an end of the day skin care regimen. If you are looking for a daytime use eye cream this may not be the right fit. I find it to be far too thick and heavy for under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! It smells great and works almost overnight to get less under eye puffiness and bags. I can’t recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the texture to the scent, you can tell she’s expensive…and good skincare is worth every penny. Love the way this feels under the eyes, and will definitely continue using it as it feels very hydrating. Deducted 1 star because I haven’t noticed a significant difference in fine lines, but I enjoyed everything else about this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream for about a month now. I love how it keeps my under eyes moisturized and noticed it’s more firm now. Will continue to use it to notice the difference in wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this eyecream at the tail of the summer and start of the fall. At first found it very greasy but then I realized I just need a little tiny dot of it, and it actually is soooo moisturizing! And it doesn't fight my under eye concealer either which I am happy about. I didn't give it a five because for an eyecream it is a little too oily, but all in all it is an awesome luxury product that works perfect on colder drier days like the coldest part of the fall and all winter season.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had to use this a few times before I could tell just how much to use because a little bit goes a long way! The little wand is really helpful for me since I have long nails and I hate dipping my fingers into jars of cream. I noticed that some of my fine lines were not as noticeable and my eyes did appear more hydrated. I saw a slight difference in my “11” lines between my brows. The cream itself has a lovely scent as well. Only thing I would change is the wand and the jar lid. There’s no way of keeping the wand attached to the jar.

reviews.review_title: Really wanted it to work- not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me. It does what it says, but my eyes became too sensitive to use it in the morning. I used it at night for 2 weeks and saw a great response with hydration and dark circles, but started getting puffy which is not what usually happens with my go-to eye creams. There is some fragrance in there which is likely what did me in (normally not sensitive to fragrance, but it’s trial and error with some products. The formula caked my concealer when I initially used it during the day so that was a no for me. However, beautiful packaging and luxurious feel to the cream if you’re on the dry side. Really wish this worked better for me to use long term- it seems to be accurate in their claims if you can tolerate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells so good. It’s perfect with the winter when you get super dry. It’s very hydrating for your under eyes definitely a bit pricy but it’s a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream by Shiseido is a very rich peptide and squalene rich cream that spreads under the eyes and around the orbital bone like butter and addresses dryness, crows feet, fine lines, wrinkles, and puffiness. Ginseng extract and a blend of Japanese botanicals help brighten under eyes and reduce dark circles. As a 36 year old with a primary concern of aging around my eyes, this cream has proven itself time and time again as the perfect eye cream to help combat all of those issues and keep my eye area looking youthful. I highly recommend this eye cream, especially if you are self conscious about those crows feet or tired-looking eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eye cream! I use it as nightly ritual and put on my fourth finger, tap around the eye and spread it in a sweeping motion.  - the most obvious when I first open the lid is the scent. I like the scent, smells floral and luxurious  - In the short span of testing, puffiness seems lesser, lines is smoother albeit not gone and a little brighter.   Will continue to try it to see the long term effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a lot of puffiness under my eye and after 3 weeks of use, I noticed a significant difference in the appearance of the puffiness and lines around the eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: didn't know what to expect from this eye cream.  I haven't used Shiseido in forever and I have so many reactions to products. Color me surprised when I tried it and could actually keep it on without it breaking me out around my eye area, have a migraine, or dry me out even more. It is fragranced but I find it a powdery scent that dissipates once on the skin and isn't overwhelming in the jar. The texture is a thick cream that stays that way, moisturizing yet occlusive. I recommend it at night since I find my mascara and makeup slips off even with light application of said cream. Even though I've only been using it for a few months I can say I've seen some benefits: some of my fine lines have been minimized, dryness has been relieved, and a little texture has been refined. Its definitely not a holy grail since I am not looking for my eye area to look like it did when I was 25 but it helps me to not look so tired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine wrinkles and some creping on my eye lids. I have more pronounced dark circle on my right eye. Overall my eyes appear a bit sunken due to dehydration and insomnia. With cooler weather I tend to get some dry patches. Nothing has really helped.  It does have a strong floral scent at first, but it goes away. I went to the company site to verify how to apply properly, glad I did as I think it helped as it is a more Gua Sha type approach vs tapping the product in.  You do not need a lot of product, otherwise it doesn't absorb quickly and the fragrance may irritate sensitive eyes as a result.  Within a week, the fine crows feet softened and the sunken look diminished. My eyelids appeared smoother. I applied between the eyebrows as directed and the lines there have softened too.  Dark circles are still there, but the left eye (which was less dark) looks lighter. My right eye for awhile seemed darker, but then seemed to have shrunk in size.  It is a very thick cream, again a little goes a long way, so in the summer I could see this being a problem with my combination skin that leans more oily during that season.  It has been 3 weeks and I think my eyes show a big improvement in softness, smoothness, less wrinkles and firmer skin. My hope is with longer use the dark circles will improve.  Tip: the residue on your fingers apply to smile lines, upper lip and/or forehead. This cream helps softened any lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm delighted with the Shiseido Benefiance wrinkle smoothing eye cream. The formulation is absolutely wonderful and applies smoothly without leaving a greasy residue. It absorbs quickly and after only a couple weeks of using it, I noticed the skin around my eyes appeared brighter and tighter. I'd noticed a few crows feet over the past few years and while not gone, they are diminished. The scent is also very pleasant and mild. It has a fresh slightly rose scented smell that is light and refreshing. I'm also a huge fan of packaging and the bottle is classy and beautifully packaged. Overall, I'm a huge fan and would recommend this to anyone looking for a non greasy anti wrinkle formula that actually works. Incentivised review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very rich, moisturizing cream. It slightly smells like ‘skin so soft’. This would be a great cream for very dry skin. I have oily skin but I like that my skin will stay soft and slick enough around my eyes after applying that I can keep going around with my ring finger and give myself a little massage. I only wear it at night because it never fully absorbs. It would be too oily for me under makeup. If you’re looking for something scented (slightly floral/powdery) and super moisturizing, then this is for you. I really can’t comment to its effect on wrinkles because I use this for prevention. This product does contain parabens if you are particular about ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Influenster for testing purposes and I’m really liking it so far! I’m in my 30s and I’ve noticed some fine lines under my eyes. This is really smoothing my under eyes out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for my honest review. The smell is nice. It seems very greasy, so I use at bedtime. I have not noticed any changes yet but I have only been using for a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this eye cream by Shiseido complimentary in exchange for my honest review. This is an amazing eye cream so   luxurious feeling that smooth the skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive this product free in exchange for my honest review from influencer, This eye cream is definitely worth the money , it’s so smooth feeling, my under eyes feel hydrated and smooth. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product complimentary for testing purposes from Influenster.* I have been using Sheseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream for a month now, and have been quite happy with it. I have normal to dry skin, and this has been a wonderful fit for me. I have been using it alone to start just to make sure that I haven't had any reactions or breakouts, and it has been great. The consistency is just perfect, not too light or heavy, just a beautiful combo right in between. The cream has a very light natural scent that I love, it is not offensive or strong at all. I have been extremely pleased with the results that I have seen. I have noticed the skin around my eyes feels softer, and definitely appears healthier with a smooth and moisturized appearance. I have included a couple of pictures of my eye before, and after just a few weeks of use. I definitely can see results. The jar itself is lovely, and I also appreciate that it comes with an applicator. I will definitely be repurchasing, this is a now a must have for my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for a couple weeks, I have noticed my under eye area is very hydrated and smooth. Living in the desert definitely dries out my entire face but this cream has helped my under eyes stay hydrated all season.  The cream is thick and feels amazing when applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using this. It’s very moisturizing and it smells lovely. I haven’t used it long enough to tell a difference but if u have dryness around your eye, this will do the trick. I did receive this item to sample for review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels amazing and cooling under my eyes. It’s super smooth to apply and does feel very heavy. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and I really do feel like it has improved my wrinkles underneath and in the corners and has made them less puffy! I also struggle with dark circles and it has definitely lighten up my under eyes. Will continue to use this great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m excited to talk about this eye cream. After a few weeks of use, I have noticed that this cream has brightened and softened the area around my eyes. It smells great and is instantly soothing. I have used Shiseido products in the past, so I was extremely happy to receive and review this free sample. This is honestly part of my daily routine and I look forward to seeing further results. I highly recommend this !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

FYI - There’s no safety seal so it looks like the product is used, but don’t be alarmed, it’s not. It came with a small plastic spatula for a clean and sanitary application.

reviews.review_title: It wouldn’t be my first choice but it is a good

I am so happy I received this from Influencer to try and review complimentary!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster and Shiseido for my true and honest opinion. I really wanted this cream to be amazing, as I love Shiseido products, but it isn’t, at least not for me. I have been using this cream for about 2 weeks. I really haven’t seen any difference in my wrinkles. I am 56 and have moderate crows feet and under eye wrinkles. I don’t care for the greasiness of it. It really hasn’t done much for my crows feet nor under eye wrinkles. It does slightly tingle after it is applied but leaves a greasy after film. I think it’s a bit too thick for my liking in an eye cream.  The picture on the left was 2 weeks ago, the one on the right is today, NO FILTER.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i am so lucky i got to test this product. I absolutely love this! has definitely done some work on my eyes. busy parent of 3 kids under 10. I've definitely told some of my friends about it as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an incentivized review. I received the product for free in exchange for an honest review.   This product unfortunately doesn’t work for me. I was very excited to try it, it feels great when I’m applying it. It spreads easily, especially for how thick it is. The smell is light and dissipates quickly.   My issue is that it stays on my skin, seemingly until I wash it off. It never fully absorbed. I’d put it on at night and I could still feel it in the morning. If I put it on in the morning, I could still feel it that evening. It made no difference even if I used a very small amount.  I was very disappointed.  If you can stand that feeling it’s worth it. I also might be an outlier with this issue. Besides this the product seems great so I’m still giving it 3 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product the full amount of time to give an accurate review. I loved the way it felt its a richer cream without being sticky. The glow you get from it is unmatched. So if youre looking to brighten 10/10. I didnt really feel like it plumped or added to my anti aging. Im going to keep using it to see if it needs a longer time but my before and after pictures are the same imo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hardly ever use eye cream. For some reason it’s just something I can’t keep up with as a nightly routine. However I just had a baby 6 months ago and starting using this cream. It’s a game changer. My under eye looks so refreshing and glowing and very plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this eye cream ! It made the skin around my eyes soft, not sticky. Left a subtle radiance and glow. I have semi-sensitive skin and I didn’t have any issues with irritation, redness, breakout, etc.  It glides on smoothly , and absorbs relatively quickly.  I also tried this on my fiancé and it worked well on her sensitive skin. I can see this working well for her fine lines. I thankfully don’t have any, but it did help with plumping up the skin and brightening it. I would highly recommend this cream to others . I’m a huge fan of Shiseido products, and this has been added to my list of favorites.  This is definitely a new Favorite eye cream for me !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my 30s and not really seeing any wrinkles but I do have fine lines under my eyes. This product really is incredible. I have been using it for a few weeks now and I can definitely notice a different. My fine lines under my eyes are practically gone. That being said again I do not have deep lines. I do not like to use this under make up and I feel like since it is so hydrating and my skin being oily it doesn’t set right. But at night and days I am not wearing make up it is my go to. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed testing a full size of this product. The texture was amazing and it was not heavily scented or greasy feeling. I felt it did a nice job of tightening the area. I will be interested in seeing the long term results! Also want to add that it came with a little spatula and I don’t know why but I just love that little touch! It is very expensive but I think it will last several uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this religiously since I was sent the product free to try from Influenster. The pros: definitely hydrates the eye area and didn’t cause any irritation on my very sensitive skin, I saw some minimal plumping of the skin under the eyes. Very light scent that is pleasant. Cons: I didn’t notice much in terms of the wrinkle reducing aspect. For the price point, I was hoping for more dramatic results. I’ll continue to use it until it’s gone, maybe more time with it will yield more of a result.

reviews.review_title: A must for keeping a youthful appearance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Diminished the appearance of puffiness under the eyes after using this cream for a couple of days I could see how I woke up with a less tired looking appearance. I really like the packaging because it feels luxurious and the tiny spoon helps scoop up the product. I definitely recommend this to my friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is great for adding much needed hydration to my under eyes. It has a thin, yet rich consistency. I would also note that it is lightly scented, which I find to be unnecessary- but it does not bother my eyes. I have been using this for a few weeks and I find that it has helped with my fine lines around my eyes. It also wears well underneath makeup. A little of this goes a long way, so I see the container lasting me a long while. I would definitely recommend this eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After just a few weeks of using the eye cream daily I can see visibility firmer skin under my eyes, which is great. But what I love the most is the fact that it doesn’t sting or burn if it gets too close to my eyes. So refreshing to apply at night and loving the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is pretty and it comes with a little spatula if you don’t want to dip your finger in it. This formula is thick and luxurious feeling. It goes under my eyes so smoothly and appear to brighten the under eye area. It has a slight scent but not overpowering. I definitely will repurchase this when I run out. This will be my new go to for eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always been a fan of Shiseido products. They always  preform! I love how super hydrating this formula is. The consistency is on the thicker side, not super oily, and smells AMAZING. I’ve been using this day and night as the last step to my skincare routine and I feel like I’ve been able to notice the difference based on how well my concealers have been setting on my under eyes. The only reason why I gave it a 4 star is because it’s supposed to reduce wrinkles and I have no way of telling if it has because I don’t really have wrinkles around my eyes. This product however will fight future wrinkles, so I’m all about that! Overall a great product that will probably last me awhile (since a little goes a long way). Definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try for free, but my opinions are my own. As I get older, I’ve definitely noticed darker eye circles and crepey skin around my eyes. This product is great because a small amount packs a big punch. It comes with a handy little spatula so you aren’t constantly dipping your fingers in the jar. It goes on pretty smooth, but it is thicker than expected so it does not absorb quickly.   Overall, I haven’t seen a huge change in my skin texture or dark circles, but it’s all about consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great job. Soft and creamy like feel. Would definitely recommend this if you’re not wanting those lines around your eyes. Used each night before bed and did the job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream has a creamy thick texture, which keeps my skin moisturized all day. The scent is pleasant as well. I used this product daily for a month but didn’t notice any remarkable improvement in the skin around my eyes. Maybe with extended use I would get more results. A little expensive for the result but it will probably last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this eye cream! Not only does it go on like butter, but it makes the area around my eyes feel hydrated and soft. It also has a nice scent! I haven’t seen results yet, but I plan to keep using daily! A little goes a long way, so this jar will last a while! The packaging is also very elegant and solid!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is very smooth and smells great. The eye cream is a little thicker than I expected but it does leave my under eyes hydrated and with a dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the most moisturizing eye cream I’ve ever used. It also does not irritate my sensitive eyes. I have combo skin, and my under eyes get quite dry in the cold winter. So far this season, this cream has stopped that from happening. The jar is also huge! You only need a little bit and it is expensive, but you won’t use it up quickly. Because this keeps my under eyes very well moisturized, in turn it helps minimize the appears of wrinkles. I haven’t noticed any change to my concealer longevity. I personally use it in the morning to ensure my under eyes get that hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for testing purposes and i must say I am in love with this eye cream. I love the texture and smell. Within two weeks of using it I can see fine lines and puffyness diminishing . This product keeps skin extremely hydrated. I used it under my makeup and alone. It's a must try. : )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks Shisheido and Influenster for letting me try this product for my honest opinion! The first thing I noticed about this Shisheido Benefiance Eye Cream is how very hydrating it is. The consistency is thicker but not too heavy or greasy and a little bit really goes a long way. My under eye area tends to be dry so this has really improved the elasticity and made my skin look and feel more plump. I haven’t noticed any major difference with larger wrinkles but my skins texture is less uneven and feels softer around my eyes. With my under eye puffiness, this seemed to help diminish the appearance after using it for a while as well. The scent is there without being overpowering and I haven’t noticed any type of irritation after using this. Overall I’m definitely noticing a more youthful appearance around my eyes these days! I highly recommend using this if you’re concerned at all about aging eyes or just want to plump up and tighten your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is decent but I like my Clinique all about eyes cream better than this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for several weeks now and I have noticed such a difference in my fine lines. It’s like my skin instantly tightens when I put it on. It is nice and thick so it keeps you moisturized throughout the day. The only reason I minus one star is because I’ve noticed if I get it too close to my eye, it is quite irritating, I guess it’s more user issue not the product, but that is the reason I gave it four instead of five stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how this feels on my skin and that it rubs in well. I have not noticed any noticeable differences or changes but I know it can take time. I do like this brand as well and I was happy to get to try this product complimentary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't have wrinkles however I do have large puffy dark circles around my eyes. This eye cream really helped my dark circles, they're not as dark and puffy as usual. I think this eye cream has a pleasant smell. I think it's a great product but the price is too high for my budget. I received this free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Silk & Sheen - TBD on the Wrinkles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too soon yet to tell if it makes a difference in actually smoothing or preventing any impending wrinkles, but it's like silk going on and has a luscious sheen that makes me feel glamorous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this eye cream for a couple of weeks, I have noticed an improvement in my eye area. I have dry skin but this cream provides enough hydration that I can use it both day and night. It is light and easy to apply. I’d recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Shiseido eye cream is one of the best eye creams on the market. It is very hydrating and plumping. It made my fine lines disappear in a week. I look younger, less tired, and well-rested. It is a little pricy but a little goes a long way. Hands down for this eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this out for 2 weeks and to be honest I didn’t see any difference. I did only use it at night though because it was way too greasy to wear during the day.  I don’t do full face makeup, so perhaps it would be fine under powder foundation.   It did leave my skin feeling nice when I washed it off in the morning and I really love the light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an eye cream that is nourishing and smells lovely. Texture is creamy. It comes with a little spatula and a little goes a long way. I have been using this for the past few weeks and it definitely keeps my eye area well hydrated. I do not have wrinkles currently though so this is more of a preventative product. I’d recommend this if you need a nice rich eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for two weeks, and here are my thoughts:   -It is very thick. Maybe too much so for my oily skin, but I think it would be great for dry skin.  -A little goes a looong way! Just a tiny dab is all you need. One jar should last a long time.  -It has a light rose scent. I found it very subtle and after 2 weeks I barely notice it.   I use it at night under my eyes and haven’t noticed a big difference yet, but my skin does feel hydrated. I received a free product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I have used several eye creams and this one is definitely superior. I love Shiseido all around but this product is by far the crown jewel of their line! It does a wonderful job filling in lines. I see a big difference if I stop using it. It is also quick to dry which is a huge plus for me with both day and nighttime use. In addition to under and around my eyes I use it between my brows and am very happy with the results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish it came with some type of instructions or recommendations for when is best to use. Definitely not for use before eye makeup since it takes a good while to absorb. I didn't notice much change with my wrinkles. Top pictures are first day of using, 4 bottom pictures after 5 days of use. Good overnight moisturizer, not quite sure about the wrinkle smoothing claim.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lots to say about this product! First and foremost, it works...  The product is ultra hydrating, almost a little greasy. For this reason, it does not take a ton of product to do the job. During the day I use strictly under eye but at night I will also cover my eyelid and even rub a little in between my eyebrows.   Price point is not bad considering the small amount needed and the fact that it does actually work!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product works well but not a quickly as they say it does. It also has a fragrance that I find too strong for me especially when I use it in the evening before bed.   I received this product free from influenster in exchange for my honest opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this eye cream! I feel like the price is well worth it for the experience and the product does exactly what it says. It leaves my under eye feeling so plump and hydrated I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product for several weeks, I have come to the conclusion that it’s just not for me. It has giving me more texture under my eyes than I already had. As for any improvement with wrinkles it hasn’t done anything. For the price point you can get something better than this product lucky this was a complementary product for me to try so I didn’t have to waste my own money on this. Otherwise, I would be very upset.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this eye cream. Unlike other creams I’ve tried this one goes on silky smooth with no pull or drag on the delicate skin around the eyes. My only complaint is the fragrance. I prefer a little less in my products but it’s certainly not the worst I’ve seen. This jar will last a long time and I appreciate that value. I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange of my review. This product works. Its a bit dense for my taste but a little goes a long way. I will be getting more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this eye cream! The texture is thick and luxurious and really hydrating under the eyes. While it does have a smell it’s not too overpowering and doesn’t seem to cause any irritation to the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product and I feel like a little bit goes a long way! It sinks in so nice to your skin and doesnt Leave any residue. I would purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the Shiseido serum and face moisturizer and knew I would also fall in love with the eye cream. I'm 49 years old with a few wrinkles but not many. I have noticed lately, more creeping in. Been using the eye cream for a few weeks before I did my review and I noticed my foundation isn't settling in. It smoothed those fine lines I've been noticing lately. Highly recommend this brand, the price is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While its still too early to see a big difference (about three weeks) I am so happy Influenster sent me a sample to try in exchange for my honest review. It feels luxurious and something so special for my skin and I really hope to see a difference with wrinkles and my skin soon. I know this is a trustworthy brand and I have such high hopes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream. It’s smooth and silky and feels really luxurious on. I also absolutely love the spoon it comes with. It’s the perfect size for the amount of product needed. I don’t have wrinkles yet but I love this as a wrinkle preventative cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product in return for honest review. The packaging is amazing. It does have a skincare type scent and if you put too much I could see where it could cause issues with those sensitive to scents. First time applying I put a little too much and my eyes were watering from the scent but not bad enough to make me stop using. It was very hydrating to the skin. However, I did not see much difference in my fine line wrinkles. Would use again for the hydration alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for two weeks now so I feel like I had enough time to give a fair review.  This eye cream is good. It’s on the thicker side but spreads out easily, almost like a cream/gel hybrid so you only need a dab under each eye. Since I have oily eyelids and this cream tends to take a while to absorb, I only wore it at night and still felt the hydration under my eyes when I woke up. I can’t wear it during the day under my makeup because I feel like it will break my concealer apart and make things move around.  There is a fragrance, which I can do without. It’s not overly scented I just don’t like the idea of fragrance being too close to my eyes. The packaging is nice, comes with a little spatula to scoop out the product for hygienic purposes but I personally never use them unless there’s a way to store them like on the lid or something (Tatcha has that packaging), otherwise I just throw it out.  The jar itself seems huge. Since I only use this product at night I feel like it’ll last me a very long time.   Incredibly thankful to be given this opportunity to test it out. Will definitely continue using for hydration underneath my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received an incentive product for a review. I tried it for 6 days and feel extremely dry and have a chemical burn feeling. It's definitely not for me. I wouldn't recommend for sensitive skin. I feel disappointed like I went backwards in my skincare and damaged my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this everyday morning and night. So far, my favorite part of using this product is the feeling of luxury it adds to my skin care routine, and the immediate smoothing I notice around my eyes as my skin soaks in this product. It has a pleasant, light scent to this eye cream, the texture is medium heavy a small pea goes a long way.  when compared to others like it, and it feels immediately hydrating without being greasy. I always try new eye creams and I think this far the best I have used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been a great fan of Shiseido brand ever since my mom recommended it to me because she said it’s the only skin care brand she saw huge improvement in her skin. I was super excited to try this eye cream it works out wonderfully, I reduces dark eyes circles fast and it brightens out around the eyes and hydrates pretty well, it’s working little by little on the wrinkles, but definitely works. It comes in a small glass jar which makes it feel luxurious and it has a very almost like nothing pretty light lotion scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful, heavy eye cream for a dryer eye area.  I really enjoy the product however the smell and the fact that it’s thicker bothers me. I would have to worry about milia building up over around my eye area overtime because of how heavy the cream is.  Overall, I would re-purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels great on. Consideringi usually just use my face cream for my eyes lol i am glad this pot will last me a long time! Does it reduce the look of my wrinkles? Cant exactly say yes but i do have 1 eye that occasionally acts up and this did calm it down for lack of better word. My top lid creases were still just as bad, under eye seemed to plump a bit. Would i buy again... depends on price. As i know this will last me a long time a higher price is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this nightly for the past three weeks, and only use it before bed and haven’t tried it under makeup yet. So far, my favorite part of using this product is the feeling of luxury it adds to my skin care routine, and the immediate smoothing I notice around my eyes as my skin soaks in this product. I notice a pleasant, light scent to this eye cream, a substantial texture when compared to others like it, and it feels immediately hydrating without being greasy. I’ve never been convinced that eye creams do much more than effectively moisturize, but this one has exceeded my expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for 3 weeks. The elegance of this eye cream’s rich, creamy formula, providing intense hydration and smoothness to my under-eyes. The delightful fragrance enhances the overall experience, and it seamlessly complements my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been using this cream for a week and my dark eye bags have lightened, however i cannot test the anti wrinkle promise it does smell very good and has a light feeling on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye cream. It is so.ruch and creamy. It has a light.pleasent scent. Ive been using it.for.3 weeks and i can already tell.a difference in the.fines lines around my eyes. The skin around my. eyes looks beautiful. No puffiness or darkness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really enjoyed this wrinkle smoothing cream! I have noticed a big change in the appearance of my under eyes and just overall skin in those areas. I am really impressed and a little truly goes a long way! I also used it for my elevens and noticed a smoothing aspect and was truly impressed.  *I received this project for free in return of my honest review and opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Brought this after an employee recommended. After applying the product my under eye begin to tingle some, eventually it turned to burning, rinsed the product off and did not apply anything for a few days, now anything that I apply under my eyes that I was using previously is burning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A good hydrating eye cream! Hydration is my main problem when it comes to my skin, so I enjoyed this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is a miracle in a jar! In the winter months my under eyes can get so dry they look worse but this stuff is the solve! It’s amazing! Love using it before bed and seeing how fresh and awake I look in the morning! 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice eye cream in general. I havent noticed a lot of difference though so I dont know how smoothing it really is. But it does seem moisturizing and is at least keeping my under eye area feeling hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple of weeks I’ve noticed that the area around my eyes is more hydrated and softer. Usually around winter time I’ll get dry patches around my eyes but not this winter. This eye cream is very hydrating. There’s little to no scent . If anything a very faint clean scent that disappears almost instantly. The cream is pretty thick so you do have to be very careful not to over apply if not your eye area will look like a grease ball. You only need a pea size amount for each eye. I wore it under makeup as well and it wore fine. It didn’t disturb my makeup. I have not noticed any diminishing of the small fine lines under my eyes but for that I know it takes more or less 6-8 weeks to begin seeing those results. If you already have oily lids this product is not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product in exchange for an honest review, and I absolutely love this cream. I will say I had to look up how to use it, since it wasn’t written on the box, but other than that I love it. It smells amazing, it feel’s expensive, and it’s also got a little bit of a highlight effect too it. Just know a little goes along way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I must say, I like the thickness and the creamy texture. It feels more substantial than some other eye creams I have used. I’m not sure I saw a noticeable difference but it certainly couldn’t have hurt compared to not using anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice eye cream. You don't need a whole lot, it lasts a very long time. Texture is pretty rich and thick and absorbs to the skin very nice smoothly. For what its worth, I personally think its a good value for the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster to test/review.   Okay so I gave this product a solid 3 weeks of use before making this post. First off, it’s super hydrating which I love. With that being said, it can be slightly on the greasy side so it’s perfect as a nighttime before-bed cream. I wouldn’t try and use this under makeup. When I wake up in the morning my under eyes are well hydrated and little less tired looking. I will say unfortunately I have not noticed a difference in the fine lines under my eyes but maybe I need to use the product for longer than 3 weeks to really notice a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. This cream is very hydrating, and has a pretty nice feel to it. It made a little bit of difference in how my eyes looked, too. I like to use it only at night because it’s actually pretty heavy and greasy, but if you use the recommended amount you can’t tell. I love the packaging and I’m curious as to why the top of the lid comes off (?). This will last at least 8 months for me personally. I wore it under makeup once and even then, I had to kinda dab the greasy/oiliness away first. It’s quite expensive and I wouldn’t buy it. There are very effective and way cheaper options. But if you’re flush with cash and feeling bougie, I’d say go for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression opening the package is that you can tell this is a quality product. The jar is a nice size and feels sturdy and heavy in your hand, and the lid has a unique shape with an interesting translucent top that has a golden shine coming through. Definitely gorgeous and luxurious looking. It also comes with a tiny spoon for sanitary dispensing so you don’t have to stick your finger in the jar.  Now onto the product itself. It has a verrrrry subtle fresh scent to it. So subtle, in fact, that I can’t actually tell if it is scented or not, but it is a very pleasant smell. The eye cream itself is SO thick and rich. Applying it under and around my eyes felt so smooth, soft, and creamy. I used only a small amount but even that was almost too much. You really only need a tiny amount because of how thick it is. For that reason, I can see this lasting me a very long time, which I really appreciate because you can really get your money’s worth. After one use it made my eyes feel hydrated and brighter and after continuing to use it I definitely notice my dark circles almost gone completely. I don’t have many fine lines around my eye area but I can definitely see it being a good preventative. I also like the range of ingredients which include peptides, squalane, and ginseng extract to cover multiple different concerns. I’ll be using this product till it’s very last drop and definitely 10/10 recommend for eye bags, darkness, and wrinkles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first product test from Shiseido, thanks to a incentivised sample courtesy of Influenster. I love this Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream. It is incredibly hydrating and that hydration lasts at least 24 hours. I felt that it instantly helped with the stress wrinkle between my brows. This cream also helps with plumping the fine lines around my eye area. This works so well, I'm looking to see what other Shiseido products I want to try next.

reviews.review_title: too much fragrance,  not worth the price to me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this eye cream but I couldn't.  the fragrance was a bit too heavy for me.  and it did feel greasy on my skin,  which is actually very dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is so luxurious and rich and a little goes a long way. I can definitely notice a difference in my under eyes and their hydration. For the price, it’s an amazing deal, because I can’t see myself needing a new jar for at least a year! It has very little scent, but it is a pleasant smell overall. The packaging is beautiful and it even came with a little spoon to get the cream out with!  I’m obsessed.

reviews.review_title: Nice smooth texture, no greasy feel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is so silky smooth and creamy. I love the way it feels on my skin and I haven’t noticed a greasy feel at all. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and can’t say I notice a huge difference in my eye area. The area under my eyes does appear brighter after using it and could possibly be looking slightly tighter but it’s nothing that anybody would notice other than myself. I’m not a huge fan of the smell. It reminds me of a scent that a grandmother would wear. It’s a little too perfumey for me personally. I love the weight of the jar. It’s solid and decently heavy. Appears to be glass. It’s probably a jar that I will end up saving and adding to my craft stash. I did receive this product for free in return for my honest review. But this review is 100% my own honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It made my under eyes glow! It really felt nice and cooling! I felt like a super star with such an amazing product! I loved the feel of it but I don’t think it worked great with makeup as it’s very glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream really helps nourish the skin around my eyes. I use it morning and night, and my eyes feel and look well-moisturized the entire day. It is a thicker/richer cream, but it's not greasy. It'll suit winter well since my skin gets really dry then.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product arrived in packing that looked expensive but to my surprised was actually pretty affordable. Works good. I applied it daily under my eye and around my crows feet line area. The cream was soft and non greasy. Kept my under eye soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful if you have dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to test from Influenster. It feels super rich and creamy and stays very hydrating feeling on the skin for a long time. If you have oily skin this would probably not be a good fit for you. I did notice my dark circles fading with it. Overall, if you have dry under eyes I think you’d be very happy with this and how long the hydration lasts! Definitely worth a try. It also will last you forever because you barely need any at all and it spreads very well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is luxurious and it smells very nice. It left my under eyes feeling so incredibly good and moisturized and was very refreshing. Definitely will recommend this to friends!

reviews.review_title: Meeh… does ANY eye cream really work?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free an exchange for my opinion from Influencer & the truth is I have no idea if this product did anything at all… visually I couldn’t tell if they were smoother and definitely couldn’t tell if the skin was tighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Influenster for my honest review. I like the thickness of the cream…it’s not super thick but also not thin. There is a scent but it’s not overpowering and goes away. I didn’t have too many wrinkles but it helped the ones that I did have. It also helped with my puffiness in the mornings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Influenster I was able to experience fhe luxurious feeling of this product. It feels like a thicker formula than other eye creams I have used. But it also feels creamier.  Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this straight for a month now as I wanted to really see if it did anything and let me tell you it’s truly amazing. My fine lines have disappeared, and the skin around my eyes is so hydrated. My under eye area always looked dry and crapey when I did my makeup no matter what I did but not anymore. It has also helped with the puffiness, I would wake up in the morning and my eyelids and under eye area were so puffy and swollen and nothing would help. It has dramatically improved. I will be using this eye cream for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves your eyes refreshed and smooth. I noticed it helped with fine lines in as little as two weeks. Great consistency. Not too greasy and blends well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for review from influenster.  This eye cream was nice. It does have fragrance so if you don't like fragrance you will not like it. It is a thicker cream but it does sink into the skin and does not leave a greasy residue. It does leave the eye area soft and smooth. I can't attest for the wrinkles because with any product to see those results you would have to be using it consistently for several months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first thought about this smoothing wrinkle eye cream was that it was greasy. However, I do really like it. It didn’t make my fade breakout or burn, and I have very sensitive skin. It’s thick and although I haven’t noticed any progress with my lines/wrinkles yet, I do feel like it has a positive effect. My under eyes are so much smoother than before, which in turn means my makeup sits better on my face in the areas I’ve used the cream. I will certainly continue to use this as I think it has positive effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Adfer using this product a few days my skin feels very soft. The product has a gentle smell and the packaging feels luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.   This is an excellent eye cream. The product is packaged well and has a nice rose scent - a little perfumey not over powering, and dissipates quickly. The cream melts flawlessly into my skin leaving my under eye area ready for  concealer, which blends much nicer than it did with my previous eye cream. I’m in my late 30s, and while I don’t have deep wrinkles yet, I have a few fine lines around my eyes - in just the few short weeks I’ve used this product I’m starting to see results, and that’s enough for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Influenster for the opportunity to try this product!!! I had been on the hunt for an effective eye cream for quite some time, and my search finally came to an end with the Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream. After almost three weeks of use, I am thrilled with the noticeable improvements it has made to my eye area.  One of the standout features of this eye cream is its light-weight formula. Unlike other eye creams I have tried in the past, this one did not feel heavy or greasy on my skin. It absorbed quickly and effortlessly, leaving no residue behind. As someone with oily skin, this was a major plus for me, as I was able to apply makeup right after without any issues.  The cream has a beautiful and delicate scent that adds to the luxurious experience. It is not overpowering, but rather provides a subtle, pleasant fragrance that enhances the overall application process. Additionally, the packaging is sleek and convenient, making it easy to dispense just the right amount of product each time.  In terms of results, I couldn't be happier. The Skin around my eyes feels hydrated, plump, and smoother than ever before. The fine lines that had started to creep up are visibly reduced, giving my eyes a more youthful appearance. The cream has also tackled my under-eye area, brightening it up and reducing the puffiness I often wake up with.  In conclusion, the Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream is a game-changer for anyone looking to improve the condition of their eyes. With its lightweight, non-greasy formula, delightful scent, and visible results, I am confident in saying that this eye cream is worth every penny. Treat your eyes to this wonderful product and say hello to hydrated, plumper, and more youthful-looking skin.

reviews.review_title: The perfect anti-aging eye cream for your eyes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you for receiving a free product from Influenster - SHISEIDO BENEFIANCE WRINKLE Smoothing EYE CREAM! When I entered my 30s and beyond, signs of aging began to appear and were most evident in my eyes such as dark circles, wrinkles and puffiness. In addition to my eyes, there are also tiny white particles appearing in the area around my eyes. It made me lose confidence and worry about how to make those tiny particles disappear. And surprisingly, when I looked back at the photos I took from the first day of using Shiseido eye cream to the 18th day, after only nearly 3 weeks of use, I saw a clear improvement in my eyes. Some of the tiny particles on my right eyelid have completely disappeared, other tiny particles in the under eye area have also become lighter and less numerous. The skin around the eyes and between the eyebrows is also noticeably smoother, pores are no longer obvious. Dark circles around the eyes also fade. I haven't seen a clear effect on removing wrinkles in the eye area, but the other effects of the cream as I mentioned above really surprised me and made me very happy about it. The eye cream has a thick, slightly liquid texture, not too thick, with a gentle rose scent, faint but not strong. The above effects make me love it so much that I will choose it as my indispensable eye cream. Thanks for letting me try and experience how good it is!

reviews.review_title: Everything you could want in a luxury eye cream ￼
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Influenster shiseido benefiance wrinkle smoothing eye cream review  Disclosure: I received these products for free from Influenster and Shiseido in exchange for my honest review.  Upon unboxing: The packaging is inarguably luxe. The jar is glass, giving it heft and density. The lid has the Shiseido emblem on it. The cream is a yellowish, pale egg-yolk color. Upon glancing at the ingredients, this is likely from iron oxides. The cream is noticeably fragranced.  Upon first use: A little goes a very long way in terms of moisturizing, which is not surprising considering there are waxes in the ingredient list. The texture reminds me of the Kiehl’s avocado eye cream, which I like a lot.  Under makeup, but without concealer: Eyeshadow applied slightly patchy on one eye. I only used the elf halo filter and elf hd setting powder in the eye area prior to eyeshadow application since I was in a hurry. Will try to use and set with powder prior to eyeshadow tomorrow.  Under makeup, with concealer: after allowing time to set in between applying eye cream and makeup, set much better and eyeshadow didn’t feel as patchy. I used the tarte shape tape concealer and the elf hd setting powder to set the eye area.   After using twice a day for over a week: I have a visible vein under my eye that is far less noticeable than before using the eye cream. This is incredibly impressive given the continuous sleep deprivation I’ve been through as a new mom. I don’t truly have major complaints with my eye area (like severe dark circles), so this eye cream for me is primarily for wrinkle prevention. In terms of performance though, I am impressed it could lighten the darkness under my eye by that much! Plus, there are loads of actives and herbals in this cream that make it a skincare powerhouse. The fragrance definitely makes this feel like a luxury pampering skincare product every time I use it, and it’s very enjoyable.  Would I buy it: Not right now for myself, given inflation, since this is a splu

Overall, I highly recommend Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream to anyone looking for an effective anti-aging moisturizer. It is a bit on the expensive side, but it is worth the investment. The puffiness and dark rings are barely there. I feel good when I’m makeup-free because my eyes look alive and not so tired. The cream is thick with no noticeable odor. It’s great because you use so little and it goes a long way. In the picture, you’ll see after two weeks I’ve hardly made a dent in the remaining amount. This factors in the fact that you get more for your dollar. You can use your fingers or applicator to apply. I’ve tried it on my forehead, eye, and frown creases as well and I see results there that I wasn’t expecting. It does have a slightly greasy feel if you don’t rub in completely and it takes about 10 minutes to fully absorb before putting on makeup.  I use it as soon as I wake up and before bed. I have forgotten a couple of times but it didn’t take away the long-lasting results.
